title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 312 - CONCILIATION PROCESSING
content:

State Regulations
§ 312.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 312.2 - Referral to conciliation processing
§ 312.3 - Conciliation processing
§ 312.4 - Conciliation meetings
§ 312.5 - Conciliation decisions
§ 312.6 - Suspension or modification of rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 312

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 25[2-b], 117[1]; Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 49, 57; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 49, 57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
